short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides definitions in English and Bangla (Bengali) for Bangla words on any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you read Bengali (Bangla) web pages by providing definitions in English and Bengali for any Bengali word you select on a web page. If you find yourself looking up lots of words in the dictionary while reading Bengali web pages, this extension will make life easier.
